amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 110-450 to allow regulators to fine mortgage originators, assignees and securitizers who more than occasionally (`pattern or practice') violate the minimum standards for loans established in the bill at least $1 million, $25,000 per loan. Proceeds would be held in trust by the US Treasury for the benefit of borrowers who have no other avenue for obtaining a remedy.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Frank (MA) amendment was withdrawn.
